actions.text: Amendment SA 3676 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 3676 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5503) To provide an additional $2,000,000 for hiring staff for tribal detention facilities by reducing the amounts made available through the Working Capital Fund of the Department of the Interior.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3676 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3676 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 3399.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To provide an additional $2,000,000 for hiring staff for tribal detention facilities by reducing the amounts made available through the Working Capital Fund of the Department of the Interior.
